name: Simple First Person Character Controller Mobile (Unity)
name_original: Simple First Person Character Controller Mobile (Unity)
description:
Simple First Person Character Controller Mobile (Unity)
Speed up mobile development in Unity with an easy to use first-person character controller for mobile. Nothing more, nothing less.

Key Features
-Quick and easy to add to your project.
-Works right away.
-Fully commented code.
-No programming experience needed.
-Simple.

Easy to adjust for you! Everything you need is in the inspector
-Option to invert looking on the Y axis.
-Option to disable walking.
-Option to disable looking.
-Option for move/walk speed.
-Options for X and Y look sensitivity.

Each touch is tracked, ensuring that walk movement and look movement is never mixed up or confused.

Mobile Controls
Walk using a virtual joystick.
Look around by touching and dragging across the screen.

Editor Controls
Walk using arrow keys or W,A,S,D.
Look by holding down the left mouse button and moving the mouse.

Also available on the Unity Asset Store if you would prefer:
